statements: UPDATE course_completion SET completion_status='Complete' WHERE course_id=101 AND student_id=201;

UPDATE course_completion SET completion_status = 'Completed' WHERE course_id = 101 AND student_id = 201
UPDATE course_completion SET completion_date = '2022-10-15', completion_status = 'In Progress' WHERE student_id = 202 AND course_id = 102
UPDATE CourseCompletionRates SET completion_rate = 0.85 WHERE course_id = 101;
UPDATE StudentEngagement SET engagement_rate = 0.75, course_id = 101 WHERE student_id = 201;
UPDATE CourseCompletionRates SET completion_rate = 0.75 WHERE course_id = 100
UPDATE StudentEngagement SET engagement_rate = 0.85, course_id = 200 WHERE student_id = 4
UPDATE course_completion SET completion_status = TRUE WHERE student_id = 1;

UPDATE Student SET student_name = 'John Doe' WHERE student_id = 2;
